title: What are these fonts?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213908im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fuente_6462.png)

There are 2 different fonts in that picture.. does anyone know what fonts they are and are there any similar free fonts?

 [‹ Milton Glaser Dylan poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213908/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41379 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID this Ultra Thin Slab Serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213908/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41378 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Faiyaz

comments.content:
The “SHAKIRA” logo is Busorama. The [URW version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213908/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/busorama_bold/?sample_text=SHAKIRA&sample_size=36&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) has this alternate ’S’, but it’s a bit too thick.

- Lex

o cool thanks. the light version doesnt have the same ’A’ but lol.

does anyone know the other font and any similar freefonts?
